results.title: Evaluation of Adverse Effects of Lisinopril and Rosuvastatin on Hematological and Biochemical Analytes in Wistar Rats
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@Lisinopril@@@ did not reduce serum @GENE_GOT2 @GENE_25721 @@@AST@@@, which is another marker of @<m>DISEASE_Muscular_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009135 @@@muscle toxicity@@@.

citations.NLM: Dodiya H, Kale V, Goswami S, Sundar R, Jain M. Evaluation of Adverse Effects of Lisinopril and Rosuvastatin on Hematological and Biochemical Analytes in Wistar Rats Toxicol Int. 2013 May;20(2):170-6. PMID: 24082511
citations.BibTeX: @article{24082511, title={Evaluation of Adverse Effects of Lisinopril and Rosuvastatin on Hematological and Biochemical Analytes in Wistar Rats}, author={Dodiya H and Kale V and Goswami S and Sundar R and Jain M}, journal={Toxicol Int}, volume={20}, number={2}, pages={170-6}}

results.title: Angiotensin converting enzyme inhibition prevents development of muscle and nerve dysfunction and stimulates angiogenesis in streptozotocin-diabetic rats.
results.text_hl: It was concluded that the beneficial effect of preventive @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ treatment is likely to depend upon a reduction of peripheral vascular resistance and improvement of tissue blood flow, which implicates relative @DISEASE_Hypoxia @DISEASE_MESH:D000860 @@@hypoxia@@@ as an important factor in the development of @<m>DISEASE_Muscular_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009135 @@@myopathy@@@ and @DISEASE_Nervous_System_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D009422 @@@neuropathy@@@ in experimental @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@.

citations.NLM: Cameron NE, Cotter MA, Robertson S. Angiotensin converting enzyme inhibition prevents development of muscle and nerve dysfunction and stimulates angiogenesis in streptozotocin-diabetic rats. Diabetologia. 1992 Jan;35(1):12-8. PMID: 1371757
citations.BibTeX: @article{1371757, title={Angiotensin converting enzyme inhibition prevents development of muscle and nerve dysfunction and stimulates angiogenesis in streptozotocin-diabetic rats.}, author={Cameron NE and Cotter MA and Robertson S}, journal={Diabetologia}, volume={35}, number={1}, pages={12-8}}

results.title: Early treatment with lisinopril and spironolactone preserves cardiac and skeletal muscle in Duchenne muscular dystrophy mice.
results.text_hl: Early initiation greatly attenuated @DISEASE_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D004194 @@@myocardial disease@@@ and, for the first time with these drugs, improved @<m>DISEASE_Muscular_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009135 @@@skeletal myopathy@@@.

citations.NLM: Rafael-Fortney JA, Chimanji NS, Schill KE, Martin CD, Murray JD, Ganguly R, Stangland JE, Tran T, Xu Y, Canan BD, Mays TA, Delfín DA, Janssen PM, Raman SV. Early treatment with lisinopril and spironolactone preserves cardiac and skeletal muscle in Duchenne muscular dystrophy mice. Circulation. 2011 Aug 2;124(5):582-8. PMID: 21768542
